title: No Commission - 9/15 OR 10/1 - 2 blocks to T (Maverick), BOS Harbor
posting_body: 1BR with a small office/bonus room in a highly desirable Jeffries Point location in East Boston.
Steps to Maverick Blue Line MBTA stop, waterfront, the shipyard, multiple parks and green spaces.
One stop to Aquarium, North End and downtown.
Broker Fee: $0
Available: between September 15 and October 1 (09/15/2022 – 10/01/2022).
Beds: 1.
Baths: 1
Rent includes: water and sewer; hot water
Heat: gas; cooking and hot water: gas.
Tenant pays gas, electricity and any other utilities which are not included.
Unit highlights:
- Hardwood and tile flooring, dishwasher, coin operated laundry in the building, extra storage in the basement
- Great natural light.
Both front- and back-facing.
Large fenced-in landscaped backyard
- 3rd and top floor.
Good size for one person but likely won’t work for two people size-wise or layout-wise
- 3-unit building; hallway is shared with only two other individuals (1st and 2nd floor residents) – both young professionals in their 30’s
- Quiet one-way street with easy street parking
Area highlights:
- One stop to Aquarium, North End and downtown.
- Steps to the beautiful Piers Park, Jeffries Point Yacht club, Ship Yard, waterfront, multiple other parks and open green spaces
- Multiple new developments nearby include restaurants and retail
- Lots of food options steps away
- Fitness options include a yoga studio/Cross Fit gym/YMCA/running paths along the Boston Harbor Walk
Pets: negotiable.
All candidates subject to paystubs/income verification, background and reference checks.
First month ($1,800), last month ($1,800), and half 1-month rent security deposit ($900) are required to move in.
Please reply with a brief paragraph about yourself, occupation, things you are looking for in a new place, etc.
Thank you
